text:
Last Friday's Urdu Jumu'ah khutbah was also regarding the #COVID19 #vaccine and how it is our Islamic responsibility to get vaccinated and keep ourselves, and those around us, safe.

Watch the full khutbah here:
https://t.co/MPesyg5bOf

#Covid_19 #CovidVaccine #coronavirus https://t.co/8UA4skZEdQ
